data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: bottom-mounted ADCP data: Terrace Point, California, USA (TPT001)

This metadata record describes bottom-mounted ADCP data collected at Terrace Point, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using a RDI 600 kHz Workhorse Sentinel ADCP beginning 2009-02-13. The instrument depth was 018 meters, in an overall water depth of 18 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The instrument was programmed with a sampling interval of 2.0 minutes and a vertical resolution of 1 meter.
